thread.title: Ex-Newcastle United Steven Taylor defender completes Ipswich Town move
thread.title_full: Ex-Newcastle United Steven Taylor defender completes Ipswich Town move

title: Ex-Newcastle United Steven Taylor defender completes Ipswich Town move
text:
Read more about sharing. Steven Taylor made 268 appearances for Newcastle United Former Newcastle defender Steven Taylor has completed his move to Ipswich on a deal until the end of the season. 
Taylor was available on a free transfer after leaving MLS side Portland Timbers by mutual consent in December. 
The 31-year-old centre-back had joined Portland in June following his departure from Newcastle after 13 years with the club. 
He could make his debut for Ipswich when they host Derby in the Championship on Tuesday. 
Find all the latest football transfers on our dedicated page or visit our Premier League tracker here. Share this page
